pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, April 13, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Laval, Quebec

Private meetings

8:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with local families to discuss Budget 2022 investments in housing. The Member of Parliament for Vimy, Annie Koutrakis, will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Laval, Stéphane Boyer.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

11:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Mayor of Laval, Stéphane Boyer.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

Whistler, British Columbia

Personal
